original_title: Portraits of Inspiring Lives with Neale Donald Walsch
overview: Neale Donald Walsch tells the story of the night that changed his life in ways he could never have imagined. Walsch tells us to move through every moment as if you were seeing it through the eyes of God â€“ then your whole life will wind up being a conversation with God, and it will have meaning at last.
title: Portraits of Inspiring Lives with Neale Donald Walsch
